column1: #Text=The area is known for its Lemonodasos ( " Lemon forest " ) , a vast orchard of lemon- and other citrus trees , watered by watermills and made famous by author Kosmas Politis in his 1930 novel by the same name .

column1: #Text=Daily buses run from Athens Kifissos Bus Station to Galatas , leaving at 16:30 , including on public holidays .
#Text=Buses also come in from Isthmos ( departing daily at 17:25 ) , Methana ( departing Monday to Friday at 08:00 ) and Nafplio ( departing Monday to Friday at 05:45 and 14:30 ) .

#Text=The town is on the Fanariou - Galatas - Ermionis road , which does n't have a route number , 36 km from a turn off at Epano Epidavros on National Road 70 , which runs between Corinth and Argos .
#Text=Galatas is approximately 80 km from Argos and approximately 90 km from Corinth .
#Text=Regular departures all day ; the journey takes 5 minutes .
#Text=Car and passenger ferry from/to Poros , which is itself served by ferries from Athens ( Piraeus ) .
#Text=The ancient Trizina is known as the homeland of Thiseas and it is one of the most interesting places near Poros .
#Text=All the archaeological finds from ancient Trizina are located in the Archaeological Museum .
#Text=Then , at a distance of about 3 km from Trizina there is a place called " Vasiliki Tafi " ( The Royal Cemetery ) .
#Text=This area is interesting because of the archaeological finds of the Mycenaean period .

#Text=Take the opportunity to stroll around this verdant hill with more than 30,000 lemon and orange trees with scattered taverns all around , located on the opposite coast near Galatas in the Peloponnese .
#Text=From the top , the view is panoramic .
#Text=The boat trip will only take a few minutes .
#Text=It has been declared a protected area by the European Union .
#Text=Aliki is a gorgeous beach with sand inside and out which winds up in a lagoon .
#Text=It has shallow water and Bourtzi is right across where anyone can swim to .
#Text=Located at the entrance of Poros ’ waterway , as you come in the from Hydra on the flying dolphin .
#Text=Drepani Water Ski Resort ( Hotel , swimming pool and waterski on the continent ) , Agios Georgios-Moulkia , ☏ +302298042540 , fax : +302298042546 , ✉ passage@passage.gr .
#Text=The water ski centre is managed by Sotiris Kyprios , former European Slalom Senior 1 Champion and his wife Marianna .
#Text=The resort can accommodate up to 45 skiers , and teach them how to ski from complete beginners to advanced competition slalom skiers .
#Text=The resort has a 25 m pool , sauna , jacuzzi , pro shop and restaurant that serves buffet breakfasts as well as lunch and dinner .
#Text=Walking towards the northwest in an abrupt area near Poros we find this famous wild beautiful natural environment .
#Text=The river flows furiously through a deep canyon .
#Text=Kostelenos Nurseries ( George Kostelenos ( Owner ) ) , Trizina , ☏ +302298035418 , ✉ info@kostelenosfytoria.gr .
#Text=These incubators produce the widest variety of olive trees in the world .
#Text=You will not regret the visit even if you are not a keen gardener .
#Text=It is best to arrange an appointment in advance .
